title: SMPTE-NY 2015 Holiday Party Sponsor Registration
desc: SMPTE-NY December 2015 Meeting SMPTENY 2015 Holiday Party Sponsor ? Registration ? Early bird $99 for SMPTE Members thru November 30 Early bird $135 for non-members thru November 30 $145 December 1-9 Per person Register by December 9 to have your name and company name on a large poster displayed at the party. ? You must register as a sponsor if you are a reseller, manufacturer's sales rep, manufacturer's service tech, manufacturer's marketing engineer, system integrator engineer, or profitable consultant. You can register and pay for other members of your team. If you are not already a SMPTE member, you can join at  www.smpte.org ? CBS Studio 42 524 W 57 St., New York, NY (btn. 10th and 11th Aves.) Party Date is Wednesday, December 16, 2015 5:30 PM - 8:30 PM Produced by Chuck Diehl (Evertz) and? Tim Dwight (ABC)
